---
name: MFalpha2_promoter
creator: keoni
description: S. cerevisiae MFalpha2 promoter
prefix: TACA
suffix: AACT
sequence: 
---

Promoter region of the MFalpha2 gene encoding the alpha-factor mating pheromone precursor in S. cerevisiae. This promoter is cell type-specific and active in MATalpha cells during mating response.
